data.text: @_InThisTogether Think he blocks anyone who doesn't pander to his view. Blocked me today! Such a shame 😄

@SimonLeggett5 @wrysmile9 Would someone who @SimonLeggett5 hasn't blocked kindly ask him to specify what "tripe" he is referring to. I suspect he is referring to my observation of the fact that their are no completed trial for any COVID 19 vaccines. Which there aren't. 
https://t.co/r3OJwlGfFv
@_InThisTogether @wrysmile9 That's exactly what I thought about what you're saying!

@SimonLeggett5 @wrysmile9 Am I? I think it is fair to say that those who know me consider me to be rather irreverent and a bit of a joker. I am not trying to get anyone to believe anything. In fact I am trying to encourage people to look at the evidence and make up their own minds. What tripe?
@_InThisTogether @wrysmile9 You must be to believe the tripe you're trying to get us to believe. You are very definitely a glass half empty person.
@SimonLeggett5 @wrysmile9 What makes you think I'm miserable?
@_InThisTogether @wrysmile9 It must be simply awful to go through life being as miserable as you must be!

@InfoHippo Well it's good to see that you have now recognised there are no trial results and trials are ongoing. I hope you are right. Yes that is what initial results suggest. Let's see what the outcome of these ongoing trials are. Thanks for your time.
@_InThisTogether Who do you think works for those corporations at the development level? Marketing graduates? Who developed the vaccines mate? Who actually performed the trials?

@InfoHippo Look this is a strawman argument. It is you, not me, who thinks "thousands of scientists are lying to us." Thousands of scientists have not claimed there are trial results, just you and a handful of pharmaceutical corporation executives. Even the Lancet didn't make that claim.

@_InThisTogether https://t.co/vplFBcSnzR

It's not like they're lying saying "we have all the results and this is a miracle" right?

@_InThisTogether It's called science mate, when things are still being studied, scientists tend to not claim to have dogmas about I, initial results show efficacy of the vaccine with no health risks for the majority of users, that's what they're going with, as they should.

@InfoHippo That is not what it means. Try to understand this is the record of the posted trial results, not just some .gov website. Those are the trial records. There are not any others. They didn't fail to find any results, there are no results.

@_InThisTogether Hmm and you actually think that people working on a vaccine to save millions of lives would just shut up because of an NDA after discovering they were being lied to in detriment of humanity? Holy fictional jesus, there are thousands of people working on it
@_InThisTogether What do you mean by saying Gates funded it, why is that important for you to mention? I know what you're doing mate. It's quite obvious.
@InfoHippo So you are certain they didn't sign non disclosure agreements then?

@_InThisTogether And again, millions and millions of have taken the vaccines after a 1 year research that didn't start from scratch since SARS is very similar. The swine flu took less than 6 months, the bird flu as well. So rushing it isn't even the case.

@InfoHippo To be fair the CDC are reporting that they have no trial results, so I don't see how you can accuse them of lying. I make no allegation that vaccines will "kill us" and have only mentioned that Bill Gates funded the interrim analysis published in the Lancet. What do you mean?

@_InThisTogether You directed me to a gov website that acknowledges phase 3 trials but that has the results found empty, as if that means no results were found. I'm saying that if we were being BSed, at least a handful of scientists working on the vaccine would've come out with it.

@InfoHippo Actually mate it's you who doesn't have any evidence. I have directed you to the evidence and you simply refuse to accept it. Who said thousands of scientists are lying to us? Where are these statements from thousands of scientists?
@_InThisTogether You need a credible end game for anyone to believe they are lying to us about the vaccines.
@_InThisTogether What's the purpose then? Sell vaccines that kills us all? Go bankrupt and destroy the CDCs reputation for ever? Bill gates wants to control us?

@_InThisTogether And why would thousands of scientists just remain in silence about it? The people conducting the trials? The fact that you're looking for updates on a .gov website? that you have no evidence at all and just a "lack of" posted results in one website.

@InfoHippo That "website" is the CDC record of where the trials were registered......To claim there are clinical trial results. Even though there aren't. To encourage people to believe the vaccines have been trialed and have proven safety and efficacy profiles. Which they don't.
@_InThisTogether Just because there are no posted results in that website means they're lying to us? Alright, with what objective?

@InfoHippo Nope, that's an article claiming there are peer reviewed trial results. Now go an look at the posted trial results for NCT04324606, NCT04400838, and NCT04444674. You will note that there aren't any because, as I have tried to point out, there are no completed clinical trials.
@_InThisTogether https://t.co/pcMF1HxsmR

@InfoHippo I am saying there are no completed phase 3 trials for any of the vaccines that have been "authorised." However, you say there are and phase 3 trials have been completed. So if you can direct me to the completed trial results I'll take a look. Please do.
@_InThisTogether With no real harm, auto correct to Portuguese :)

@_InThisTogether Pfizer and novavax have completed their phase 3 of the trials, the required phase for the vaccine to be approved. 
Millions of people worldwide have taken it with no realizaram besides the expected effects so what are you trying to say here?
@InfoHippo There are no completed trials, There are interim reports of ongoing trials. There are no peer reviewed completed trials. In fact they are years away from completing trials.
@_InThisTogether On the same page but i didn't purposely press the "no results posted" tab.

@_InThisTogether Good try, there are no results posted but there were trials still. 

https://t.co/dYKeaXWVDT

@InfoHippo What trials?
https://t.co/pBkmxoO4Se

@_InThisTogether Stopped at Bill and Melinda Gates foundation, all that's missing from the article is George Soros.
Guess this is one of your conspiracy takes. Wrong information in the article about thenoxford vaccine whose trials were peer reviewed.
@proletarius64 @_InThisTogether https://t.co/YWqawMmVxc
@proletarius64 How weird. Just logged on after someone dropped a comment on my site asking me about this. No I hadn't. Will check it out. Cheers.
@_InThisTogether @grindal_karl @delbigtree https://t.co/jyHk7y7wuC

@_InThisTogether @grindal_karl https://t.co/R9dnlGstXW
Nobody tells it better than @delbigtree

@chatttylady I've linked directly to clinical trials dot gov in the article. Can't you open it? (genuine question) If you do, you will be able to follow numerous links to the primary evidence and make if it what you will.
@_InThisTogether provide links please.
